5: Ho~ Ho~ That's endless! All zombies are attracted by the Houkai source here! We need to stop it.
呼~呼~真是没完没了！没想到周边的死士都被这里的崩坏源吸引过来了！再这样下去有点不妙呢。
ハァ、ハァ……キリがない！学園中のゾンビが、崩壊源に吸い寄せられてるみたい！ゴホッ——このままじゃ、ちょっとまずいかも。
하, 하…… 끝이 없어! 학교 안의 좀비들이 붕괴원에 빨려 들어가는 것 같아! 으억—— 이대로라면, 좀 위험할지도.
Huff, huff... There's no end to them! It's like all the zombies are swarming to the Honkai Source! Cough— If this keeps up, it'll be a bit of a problem.
Huh- huh-Não há fim para eles. Eu não esperava que os zumbis viessem aos montes  para a fonte de Honkai aqui. Será um pequeno problema se isto continuar.
Hoo~Hoo~ It's endless! I didn't expect the surrounding dead to be attracted by the collapse source here! It's not good to continue like this.
Ha, ha ...... there's no end to it! It's like all the zombies in the school are being sucked into the source of the decay! Gosh--this might not be a good idea.
We are run out of ammo, time is also not enough for us. We must find the target……
子弹已经快消耗完了，时间也不多了，必须立刻找到目标才行……
弾も切れちゃったし……あちこち痛む……早くターゲットを見つけないと……。
탄약도 다 떨어졌고…… 여기저기 아파…… 빨리 타겟을 찾지 않으면…….
Out of ammo... and I'm hurting all over... I have to find the target, fast...
Quase sem munições, quase sem tempo... Tenho que encontrar o alvo, rápido.
Bullets have been almost consumed, and time is not much, must immediately find the target to do ......
I'm out of bullets and I'm hurting all over...... I need to find a target fast.......
It's not a zombie…… So… I finally found you! Stop!
那个人影看起来不像是死士……难道是！？终于到了你了！给我站住！
今の……ゾンビじゃない！まさかっ！？やっと見つけた、待ちなさい！
방금…… 좀비가 아니야! 설마!? 드디어 찾았다, 기다려!
That didn't look like a zombie... Could it be?! Finally found you, wait up!
Isso não parecia um zumbi... poderia ser?! Finalmente o encontrei! Espere!
That figure doesn't look like a dead soldier ...... Could it be! Finally, it's your turn! Stop right there!
Not ...... zombies now! No way! I finally found it, wait!
Errr!? This is a student? A normal human…
呃！？这是…学生么？没想到居然还有没被崩坏感染的人类…
って、学生？何だ、人違いか……もう紛らわしいな！でも、崩壊に感染してない人がまだ残ってるなんて……。
어, 학생? 뭐야, 사람 잘못 본 거야…… 정말 헷갈리게! 하지만 붕괴에 감염되지 않은 사람이 아직 남아있다니…….
Wait, a student? So I've got the wrong person... This is so confusing! But to think there's still someone left who hasn't been infected by the Honkai...
Eh?! Isto é... uma estudante? Não pensei que ainda houvesse pessoas que não tivessem sido infectadas pelo Honkai...
Uh! Is this... a student? I didn't realize there were humans who weren't infected by the Avalanche...
A student? What, you've got the wrong guy. ...... It's confusing already! But I can't believe there are still people left who haven't been infected by the collapse. ......
You are wearing senior uniform, what' your name?
看你的校服好像是高年级的学生，你叫什么名字？
その制服、ひとつ上の先輩だよね。名前は？
그 교복, 한 학년 위 선배 맞지? 이름은?
Judging from that uniform, you must be a year above me. What's your name?
Seu uniforme, é o utilizado para os alunos do terceiro ano. Qual é seu nome?
It looks like you're a senior in school uniform. What's your name?
That uniform, one senior. What's your name?
喂！你是哑巴么？给点反应好不好？
ねぇ！聞いてる？頭、溶けちゃってんの！？何か言ってよ。
야! 듣고 있어? 머리, 녹아버린 거야!? 뭐라도 말해 봐.
Hey! Are you listening? Has your brain turned to mush?! Say something.
Ei, você pode me ouvir? Você poderia talvez... responder?
Hey! Are you mute? Can you give us some response?
Hey! Are you listening to me? Your head, it's melting! Say something.
Ah~ Seems she is so scared… Fine, I can't protect myself now, you should find a place to hide.
哎~看样子一定是被吓坏了吧…不管了，我现在可是自身难保，你赶紧找个隐蔽的角落躲起来吧。
えっと～、もしかして恐怖で声も出ないとか？まっ、無理もないか……それより、私にあなたを守る余裕まではないからさ、落ち着くまでどっかに隠れてた方がいいよ。
어음~, 혹시 무서워서 목소리도 못 내고 있는 거야? 뭐, 그러겠지…… 그보다, 내가 널 지켜줄 여유까지는 없으니까, 진정될 때까지 어딘가에 숨어 있는 게 좋을 거야.

Uhh~ Maybe she's so scared, she can't even speak? Well, that's understandable... Anyway, I don't have the capacity to protect you right now, so it'd be better if you hide somewhere until you can calm down.
Ah... Você deve estar muito assustado para falar. Tanto faz... Tenho minhas mãos ocupadas, então vá você mesmo procurar algum  lugar para se esconder.
Hey ~ looks like it must be terrified of it ... no matter, I am now but their own protection, you hurry to find a hidden corner to hide.
Well, maybe you're so scared you can't even speak? Well, I don't think it's too much to ask. ...... I can't afford to protect you, so you'd better hide somewhere until you calm down.
This place is not safe anymore… If you give up then no one can save you… See you… Wish you good like.
啧！这里已经不安全了…你如果自己放弃生存希望的话谁也救不了你，即使带上你也是拖后腿…再见，你可不要怪我哦。
くっ！早く離れないとまずそうだね……聞こえてるでしょ？あなたも逃げなさい！それじゃ……じゃあね。
큭! 빨리 떨어지지 않으면 위험할 것 같아…… 들리지? 너도 도망쳐! 그럼…… 안녕.
Shit! I need to get out of here, fast... You can hear, right? You better run too! Well then... see ya.
Nossa, aqui não é mais seguro! Se você perdeu a vontade de sobreviver, então ninguém pode salvá-la. Mesmo se eu o levar comigo, você só me atrasará. Adeus, não me culpe.
Tsk! This place is no longer safe...you can't save anyone if you give up hope of survival yourself, even taking you with you is a drag...goodbye, you don't blame me oh.
Damn! If we don't get away soon, it's going to be bad. ...... I know you can hear me. You should run too! Well then,...... see you later.
Ah… I can't do this! Follow me!
あー、もうっ！！何で逃げようとしないのよ！ほらっ、こっち！
아, 진짜!! 왜 도망치려고도 안 하는 거야! 자, 이쪽으로!
Ah, come on!! Why aren't you running?! Here, this way!
Ugh! Apenas a minha sorte. Venha comigo!
Hey! It's my bad luck! Come with me!
Oh, God! Why don't you try to escape? Here, come on!

You just stay here well, this is the old school building, for a while should not be found by the dead soldiers. I'm not going to stay and help you this time, so you'll be on your own next ~
